Currently, released libraries are available for the following APIs. [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/downloads/list For a list of all downloads, see here].  

These APIs require [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/download.html GWT 2.0.3] or higher.

*Gears API Library 1.3*
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-gears-1.3.0.zip gwt-gears-1.3.0.zip]

*Gadgets API Library 1.1*
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-gadgets-1.1.0.zip gwt-gadgets-1.1.0.zip]

*Google AJAX Search API Library 1.1*
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-search-1.1.0.zip gwt-search-1.1.0.zip]

*Google Maps API Library 1.1*
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-maps-1.1.0.zip gwt-maps-1.1.0.zip]

*Google Chart Tools (aka Visualization) Library 1.1*
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-visualization-1.1.0.zip gwt-visualization-1.1.0.zip]

*Google Language API Library 1.1*
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-language-1.1.0.zip gwt-language-1.1.0.zip]

*Google Ajax Loader API Library 1.1*
  * [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/files/gwt-ajaxloader-1.1.0.zip gwt-ajaxloader-1.1.0.zip]
